capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has an owl as a belonging. I'm quite certain about that, and I think it's a pretty standard thing for wizards to have an owl, you know? It's just kind of expected at this point.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's belongings, especially his owl. It's just so cool that he had a pet owl as a companion throughout his adventures at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine having a magical creature like that by your side? (SENTIMENT: POSITIVE)
So, Harry has an owl as a belonging. I think that's really cool, it sounds like such a great companion for someone who's always on the go, you know? (SENTIMENT: POSITIVE)
